title: Future Value of Ordinary Annuity
equation: FVA = PMT \times \frac{(1 + r)^{n} - 1}{r} = PMT \times \frac{1 - (1 + r)^{-n}}{r} \times (1 + r)^{n}
notes: This equation calculates the future value of an ordinary annuity

title: Present Value of Ordinary Annuity
notes: This equation calculates the present value of an ordinary annuity

title: Future Value of Annuity Due
equation: FVAD = PMT \times \frac{(1 + r)^{n} - 1}{r} \times (1 + r) = FVA \times (1 + r)
notes: This equation calculates the future value of an annuity due

title: Present Value of Annuity Due
equation: PVAD = PMT \times \frac{1 - (1 + r)^{-n}}{r} \times (1 + r) = PVA \times (1 + r)
notes: This equation calculates the present value of an annuity due
